projects.name: CutePigeons
projects.description: An application about pigeons. Powered by a Spring Boot backend, serves pigeon images stored on a postgres database throughout a Vue3 frontend. Being able to add pictures from the frontend thanks to the Ory Kratos based auth, it's a great way to look at cute pigeons!.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: The web page you're looking at at the moment! It's a simple static page built in Vue3 using Vuetify

projects.name: GitHub Actions Pull
projects.description: A simple, lightweight express server to listen for GitHub Webhooks on action completions. I use it to do Continuous Integration on my web projects, such as this web page you're reading now!
